participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Creative, adventurous, and a bit eccentric due to his vast hat collection.
participant_1.background: i've a weakness for vanilla ice cream. i love cats and have two cats. my favorite season is winter. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. i won a gold medal in the 1992 olympics.

participant_2.name: Rachel
participant_2.personality: Intellectual, organized, and nurturing, with a passion for learning and a keen interest in documentaries.
participant_2.background: my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i live with my husband in pennsylvania.
